ValidationRule.description: Projects who are in process require a health rating.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( OR( ISPICKVAL(pse__Stage__c,"Open - In Process"), ISPICKVAL(pse__Stage__c,"Open - On Hold") ), OR( ISPICKVAL(pse__Project_Status__c,""), ISPICKVAL(Schedule_Status__c,""), ISPICKVAL(Budget_Status__c,""), ISPICKVAL(Technical_Status__c,""), ISPICKVAL(Customer_Status__c,"") ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please populate the status indicators with the RAG status.
